com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager.impl

Class JobMonitorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager.impl.JobMonitorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobMonitor, java.lang.Runnable

    @Named
 @Scope(value="prototype")
public class JobMonitorImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobMonitor
    The monitor thread that gets launched for each job.
